overview: Two criminals misplace $1.5 million of dirty money, wich is discovered by three college grads on their first night in the real world. Feeling this is their only opportunity for success in a bad economy, the graduates soon find themselves plunged into the worst night of their lives as they struggle to hold on to their fortune in this darkly comic thriller.
tagline: College grads, criminals, $1.5m, and the recession collide in one chaotic night in Los Angeles.
title: The Hands You Shake
